message_1: Suppose there are 10 fishers who share a lake containing 100 fish. Each fisher can catch a maximum of 10 fish. If they all fish without restriction, what is the maximum number of fish each fisher can catch?
message_2: If there are 10 fishers and each can catch a maximum of 10 fish, then each fisher can catch the maximum number of fish, which is 10 fish per fisher.
